Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I have immediate feedback when it comes to AI whereas trying to get an email back from a Unit Chair can take weeks.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I value/trust the feedback from teachers a lot more compared to AI but I have no emotional response (or care I guess) if AI was to give me negative feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I have to consistently tell the AI to be direct/strict and look for areas that need improvement when giving feedback, or else I find that it will always say that something is "good"
